content.p: Module convenor: Alicia Chng & Mr Ahmad Kamil Hakimien Department: Careers Office There are many different ways to explore career options. Through this module, students will discover career options linked to a range of different industrial sectors. Students will research and evaluate the career paths information in order to narrow down their list and identify the careers that students will want to pursue after graduation. This module aims to develop students in: Researching various jobs available in the job market Learning different ways to research potential careers Expanding their personal network, uncovering the hidden job market and exploring alternative careers Making an informed career decision Understanding and identifying your interest, strengths, skills and values To register to this module, please go to Nottingham Moodlehttps://moodle.nottingham.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=141395 page by 1th October 2024, Tuesday at 10:00am. Registration is on first come first serve basis as the seats are limited. By registering to accredit this module you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
